previewArticle.title: Cruz Azul vs. Sporting Kansas City | CONCACAF Champions League Match Preview

recapArticle.title: Cruz Azul 5, Sporting Kansas City 1 | CONCACAF Champions League match recap

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.
Attempt missed. Claudio Bieler (Sporting Kansas City) left footed shot from a difficult angle and long range on the left is too high. Assisted by Graham Zusi.

timelineItems.name: Diego Gutierrez
timelineItems.text: I hope that chance by Peterson doesn't haunt #SKC later..

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Marco Fabián (Cruz Azul) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses the top right corner.

timelineItems.name: Matt Terrill
timelineItems.text: What did I say earlier about Zusi needing to shield Gardner?! Josh just got worked. Gonna be a long night. #CAZvSKC

timelineItems.name: Alejandro Bunbury
timelineItems.text: Vamos maquina !!!! #CruzAzul 1-0 #Kansas

timelineItems.name: CONCACAF Español
timelineItems.text: That was Mariano Pavone's 2nd 2013-14 #CCL goal ... #CONCACAF @Cruz_Azul_FC

timelineItems.comment: Mauro Formica (Cruz Azul) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Josh Gardner (Sporting Kansas City).
Corner,  Cruz Azul. Conceded by Jacob Peterson.
Corner,  Cruz Azul. Conceded by Kevin Ellis.
Mariano Pavone (Cruz Azul) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Matt Besler (Sporting Kansas City).

timelineItems.name: Brian B.
timelineItems.text: Say what you want about #MLS's cap and roster rules, it doesn't prevent #CONCACAF from happening. Hard to level a playing field that crooked

timelineItems.comment: Claudio Bieler (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Gerardo Torrado (Cruz Azul).

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Inicia el partido en el Estadio Azul. @Cruz_Azul_FC vs @SportingKC (Global: 0-1) #CAZvSKC

timelineItems.comment: Kevin Ellis (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Marco Fabián (Cruz Azul).
Match ends, Cruz Azul 5, Sporting Kansas City 1.

timelineItems.name: Steve Brisendine
timelineItems.text: Fabian looked on. However, Socrates *was* offside.

timelineItems.name: Angel Flores Higuera
timelineItems.text: #SportingKC catch a break. Don't know exactly what the ref was thinking. #CCL #CAZvSKC

timelineItems.name: Brian
timelineItems.text: I am no fan of #SKC but I hope they can strike the death blow on Cruz Azul tonight...#MLS BABY!!! #CCL #SportingKC

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Sergio Nápoles (Cruz Azul) left footed shot from more than 35 yards is high and wide to the left. Assisted by Christian Giménez.
Foul by Jacob Peterson (Sporting Kansas City).
Sergio Nápoles (Cruz Azul) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Kevin Ellis (Sporting Kansas City).
Marco Fabián (Cruz Azul) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Octavio Macias Abril
timelineItems.text: 30 GG nuestra posición en la cancha, habilitados por derecha y nuestro chelero habilitándonos las #tecate #estadioazul #cruzazul

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Marco Fabián (Cruz Azul) left footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Christian Giménez with a through ball.

timelineItems.name: Jamie Pinney
timelineItems.text: Riot police. Nice to see such a family friendly atmosphere. #ConcacafChampionsLeague

timelineItems.name: Andy Edwards
timelineItems.text: Whooooole lots of work to do now. Never seen a guy 20 yards all by himself. #SportingKC #CCL

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: GOL (23') | Pavone anota el segundo para @Cruz_Azul_FC tras un rebote que deja el arquero y los pone en ventaja en el global, 2-1. #CAZvSKC

timelineItems.name: Tom Marshall
timelineItems.text: Pavone gets his second as Cruz Azul move ahead on aggregate against Sporting KC.

timelineItems.name: Jason Marquitz
timelineItems.text: No one in #SKC defense seems particularly interested in paying any attention to Marco Fabian. Works for me. #CCL

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Cruz Azul. Conceded by Ike Opara.

timelineItems.name: J.M.
timelineItems.text: It's a good thing we saved our best players for tonight. What would we do without Josh Gardner, Kevin Ellis, and Jacob Peterson... #SKC

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Paulo Nagamura (Sporting Kansas City) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Claudio Bieler.
Attempt blocked. Benny Feilhaber (Sporting Kansas City) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Attempt saved. Gerardo Flores (Cruz Azul) header from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Sergio Nápoles with a cross.

timelineItems.name: Jason Marquitz
timelineItems.text: Oooh. Cruz Azul close again. Jerry Flores puts heads a corner straight at the keeper. This is going well #CruzAzul. #CCL

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Ike Opara (Sporting Kansas City).
Mariano Pavone (Cruz Azul) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Hand ball by Gerardo Flores (Cruz Azul).

timelineItems.name: Avi Creditor
timelineItems.text: This was not the welcome back to Mexico Graham Zusi deserved. Gimenez, Fabian, Pavone carving up SKC. Away goal still does it though #CCL

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Luis Perea (Cruz Azul).
Claudio Bieler (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Tim Armstrong
timelineItems.text: And again on Ellis's side. Maybe the narrative on #SKC twitter will shift off Gardner now.

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Cruz Azul. Mariano Pavone tries a through ball, but Marco Fabián is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: MLS Fantasy Insider
timelineItems.text: It's half the Mexican national team (at home) vs Zusi, Besler and a bunch of backups. If SKC pull this one off it'll be a miracle. #CAZvSKC

timelineItems.name: Steve Brisendine
timelineItems.text: Things I wondered before kickoff tonight: "Have Sporting practiced bringing Kronberg up for desperation corner, if needed late?"

timelineItems.name: the_norman_life
timelineItems.text: 1 goal from @SportingKC will get them back in the game and #CAZ will need 3 goals

timelineItems.name: JaviER
timelineItems.text: Vamos Pavone por el Hat Trick!! #CruzAzul #CCL

timelineItems.comment: Delay in match Josh Gardner (Sporting Kansas City) because of an injury.

timelineItems.name: Metrohooligan101
timelineItems.text: Sporting you're not in Kansas anymore...#ccl #mls #dosacero

timelineItems.comment: Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Foul by Claudio Bieler (Sporting Kansas City).
Gerardo Flores (Cruz Azul) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Steve Brisendine
timelineItems.text: A few SKC fans clapped/cheered when Gardner went down. Majority didn't. Advantage, human decency.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Josh Gardner (Sporting Kansas City) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Claudio Bieler.

timelineItems.name: Dan Huntington
timelineItems.text: I'm curious to know at what point the Champions League stopped mattering to Vermes. #SKC

timelineItems.name: Sporting Kansas City
timelineItems.text: .@Cruz_Azul_FC was able to get behind SKC backline in the 23rd minute to take the 2-0 lead. A road goal would see SKC advance to semis.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Marco Fabián (Cruz Azul) left footed shot from a difficult angle on the left is saved in the top left corner. Assisted by Joao Rojas with a cross.
Foul by Benny Feilhaber (Sporting Kansas City).
Gerardo Flores (Cruz Azul) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt missed. Christian Giménez (Cruz Azul) right footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the left. Assisted by Gerardo Torrado.

timelineItems.name: Jared Coffman
timelineItems.text: Completely agree with the announcer. Have to get Feilhaber more involved, good things tend to happen #SKC

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: GOL (2') | Mariano Pavone abre el marcador para los locales. @Cruz_Azul_FC 1-0 @SportingKC (Global: 1-1) #CAZvSKC

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Cruz Azul. Gerardo Torrado tries a through ball, but Joao Rojas is caught offside.
Attempt missed. Mariano Pavone (Cruz Azul) header from very close range is just a bit too high. Assisted by Marco Fabián with a cross.

timelineItems.name: Andy Edwards
timelineItems.text: All on #SportingKC's shoulders now. #CCL

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Gerardo Torrado (Cruz Azul).
Claudio Bieler (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Chris Cooper
timelineItems.text: This game is getting annoying to me. Ellis and Gardner are not ready for this game. #skc

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Sporting Kansas City. Conceded by Gerardo Flores.

timelineItems.name: Ivy Tiger
timelineItems.text: Ellis is getting run over. #skc

timelineItems.name: Jason Davis
timelineItems.text: Everyone in my timeline giving up on MLS. Fair, I suppose, but SKC isn't quite dead yet.

timelineItems.name: Andy Edwards
timelineItems.text: LIFE!!!! #SportingKC #CCL

timelineItems.name: Mike Pacific
timelineItems.text: And SKC ties it on agg! #MLS #CCL

timelineItems.name: Matthew Doyle
timelineItems.text: True story: Feilhaber has been Sporting's best non-Collin player since last October.

timelineItems.name: Jason Davis
timelineItems.text: LONG LONG way to go. But with this scoreline, SKC goes through.

timelineItems.name: Steve Brisendine
timelineItems.text: And there it is, the away goal Sporting needed so desperately. Benny Feilhaber with a laser inside the left post.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: ¡GOLAZO! (43') | Benny Feilhaber descuenta para @SportingKC tras cobro de esquina de Zusi, y se ponen en ventaja en la serie. #CAZvSKC 2-2

timelineItems.comment: Joao Rojas (Cruz Azul) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Kevin Ellis (Sporting Kansas City).

timelineItems.name: Steve Brisendine
timelineItems.text: CAZ have to push now. Look for a wide, wide, wide open match early after the break.

timelineItems.name: Steve Brisendine
timelineItems.text: Ellis with the CONCACARD. They don't carry over, though.

timelineItems.name: Matthew Johnson
timelineItems.text: No pressure @SportingKC. The entire hopes and dreams of #MLS rest on your shoulders #ccl

timelineItems.name: Zahid salazar
timelineItems.text: Penalty? He straight out went Nigel De Jong on Fabian #CCL #CAZvSKC

timelineItems.name: Austin Fido
timelineItems.text: Cruz Azul has suffered more blown calls in these qfinals than the rest of the teams combined. #CCL #CAZvSKC

timelineItems.name: Andy Edwards
timelineItems.text: That 45 felt like 90 minutes, just like last Wednesday's 90 felt like 180. Champions League isn't for the weak-hearted. #SportingKC #CCL

timelineItems.comment: First Half ends, Cruz Azul 2, Sporting Kansas City 1.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: PT | @Cruz_Azul_FC 2-1 @SportingKC. Con el resultado actual, los visitantes tienen ventaja en la serie. #CAZvSKC (Global: 2-2)

timelineItems.name: Steve Brisendine
timelineItems.text: Correction: Ellis will be suspended for semis, if Sporting advance. Single yellows don't carry over.

timelineItems.name: Colin Reese
timelineItems.text: Benny Feilhaber is still one of the only America players who can ball against non-MLS competition. The #USMNT needs him. #CCL #CAZvSKC

timelineItems.name: MLS Fantasy Insider
timelineItems.text: Benny Feilhaber continues to prove the haters wrong. Thinks he deserves DP money. Might just have a case. #CAZvSKC

timelineItems.name: Andy Edwards
timelineItems.text: #SportingKC are 45 scoreless or level minutes away form advancing to the #CCL semifinals. Gonna be a loooooong 45.

timelineItems.name: Diego Pinzón
timelineItems.text: Vermes, here's the plan: having Collin enter the game. He helps you with a header, and then sub him out before he gets ejected #CAZvSKC

timelineItems.comment: Second Half begins Cruz Azul 2, Sporting Kansas City 1.

timelineItems.name: Steve Brisendine
timelineItems.text: Fourth quarter under way in Mexico City. If Sporting lose by this score, Sporting win.

timelineItems.name: Daniel Ronald Moreno
timelineItems.text: My buddies @dpalomitas & @DiegoGG182 enjoying the game! It be repping my #SKC jersey. http://t.co/qUC0yXm6qz

timelineItems.name: Daniel Ronald Moreno
timelineItems.text: My buddies @dpalomitas & @DiegoGG182 enjoying the game! It be repping my #SKC jersey. http://t.co/qUC0yXm6qz

timelineItems.comment: Mariano Pavone (Cruz Azul) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Matt Besler (Sporting Kansas City).

timelineItems.name: Gaby Ladrón.
timelineItems.text: Cruz azul vs Kansas city. #concacaf #today #marzo19

timelineItems.name: Tom Marshall
timelineItems.text: Cruz Azul striker Mariano Pavone's first goal since Jan. 26. Was talking about the pressure on him ahead of the game.

timelineItems.name: Steve Brisendine
timelineItems.text: Sporting just need 1; advance with a draw or 2-1 loss.

timelineItems.comment: Mauro Formica (Cruz Azul) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Mechack Jerome (Sporting Kansas City).

timelineItems.name: Kaitlyn Marie ⚽️ ️
timelineItems.text: Wish we had as many goals as we do yellow cards. Come on boys!!! #SKC

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Mauro Formica (Cruz Azul) left footed shot from the centre of the box is just a bit too high.

timelineItems.name: MLSinSTL
timelineItems.text: Finally we are playing smart soccer. They can't score if they don't have the ball. #SKC #CCL

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Sporting Kansas City. Conceded by Julio C. Domínguez.

timelineItems.name: joe offebacher
timelineItems.text: Odds that Jerome makes it to the end of the game? With that Yellow I'd say 30% and falling fast... #SKC #CCL

timelineItems.name: Brandon Walker
timelineItems.text: The reason @mls teams haven't won a @CONCACAF cup is #Mexican refs give cards for nothing to #mls sides but overlook Mexican sides fouls

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Gerardo Torrado (Cruz Azul).
Benny Feilhaber (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Mauro Formica (Cruz Azul) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Matt Besler (Sporting Kansas City).

timelineItems.name: Andy Edwards
timelineItems.text: #SportingKC with 30 minutes to rescue #MLS dreams of winning #CCL this year. Bah.

timelineItems.name: Karla Morales
timelineItems.text: #EstadioAzul #CruzAzul #KansasCity #Concacaf #meencanta #futbol

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: GOL (55') | Hattrick de Mariano Pavone y le da la ventaja a @Cruz_Azul_FC en la serie. #CAZvSKC 3-1 (Global: 3-2)

timelineItems.name: Steve Brisendine
timelineItems.text: No answer for Pavone. And once again, it's a fullback at the tail end of the mismatch.

timelineItems.name: Amy Worley
timelineItems.text: Okay, so what did Pavone have for dinner? We need some of that. #SportingKC #CAZvSKC #CCL

timelineItems.name: Erik Abarca
timelineItems.text: I know PV was resting Collin, but u gotta go all in here, just go for it. I would have started Collin. #SKC #CAZvSKC #CCL

timelineItems.name: Tobes
timelineItems.text: PV looks helpless on the sideline….boys are not playing well defensively. #SKC

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Joao Rojas (Cruz Azul) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Attempt missed. Gerardo Torrado (Cruz Azul) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses the top right corner.

timelineItems.name: Fausto Pinto
timelineItems.text: Vamos #CruzAzul que le damos vuelta http://t.co/QonZbzMvFI

timelineItems.name: Fausto Pinto
timelineItems.text: Vamos #CruzAzul que le damos vuelta http://t.co/QonZbzMvFI

timelineItems.name: Devin Pleuler
timelineItems.text: Including CCL performances, Feilhaber has been the best American #MLS player this season.

timelineItems.name: Ahmëd K
timelineItems.text: Where would the #MLS clubs be without the Aggregate to help out? It's tough to depend on away goals in hostile environments.

timelineItems.name: Clemente Miranda
timelineItems.text: Cruz azul playing into the space, hard t defend that... #SKC will have troubles coming back on this one

timelineItems.comment: Hand ball by Gerardo Torrado (Cruz Azul).

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: En una hora, @Cruz_Azul_FC y @SportingKC lo definen todo en el Estadio Azul ---> http://t.co/YwTXSPuxnt #CAZvSKC http://t.co/FvpMZMSJog

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: En una hora, @Cruz_Azul_FC y @SportingKC lo definen todo en el Estadio Azul ---> http://t.co/YwTXSPuxnt #CAZvSKC http://t.co/FvpMZMSJog

timelineItems.name: Brandon Walker
timelineItems.text: Does @SportingKC even want to win? Not the same play so far that I saw last season! #ConcacafChampionsLeague

timelineItems.comment: Lineups are announced and players are warming up.

timelineItems.name: Zahid salazar
timelineItems.text: Marco Fabian having his way out there with the #SKC right back! #CAZvSKC #CCL

timelineItems.comment: Claudio Bieler (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Julio C. Domínguez (Cruz Azul).

timelineItems.name: Matthew Doyle
timelineItems.text: How much longer do we have to pretend that Zusi is anything but "average" on set pieces? Launch a few more to row 12 I guess.

timelineItems.name: Andy Edwards
timelineItems.text: Done. Cooked. #SportingKC #CCL

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Mariano Pavone (Cruz Azul) left footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Marco Fabián.

timelineItems.name: g_cubed
timelineItems.text: #SKC looks terrible. Absolutely horrendous. So embarrassing.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: GOL (66') | Formica anota el cuarto. #CAZvSKC 4-1 (Global: 4-2)

timelineItems.name: earle_evans
timelineItems.text: Where the hell is Kronberg going? #CCL #CAZvSKC

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Alineación @SportingKC: Kronberg; Ellis, Opara, Besler (C), Gardner; Rosell, Nagamura, Feilhaber; Zusi, Bieler, Peterson #CAZvSKC

timelineItems.name: Brooke Tunstall
timelineItems.text: Mechak Jerome - not a fullback. Oi! #CCL #CAZvSKC

timelineItems.name: Andy Edwards
timelineItems.text: DO NOT say "why didn't we try harder in the league the first two weeks?" You don't get to use hindsight like that. #SportingKC

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Mariano Pavone (Cruz Azul) right footed shot from a difficult angle on the right is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Joao Rojas with a cross.

timelineItems.name: Diego Gutierrez
timelineItems.text: Alright, here we go. #SKC MUST be hard on Fabian, Benitez, Pavone.

timelineItems.name: Andy Edwards
timelineItems.text: It's the same people who, if #SportingKC don't put out an A-team in #CCL, say, "why didn't we try harder in CCL and sacrifice the league?"

timelineItems.name: Josh Lafferty
timelineItems.text: When is @MLS going to raise the salary cap to an acceptable number? We clearly can't compete with Mexico! #CCL #mls Shameful!

timelineItems.comment: Marco Fabián (Cruz Azul) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Kevin Ellis (Sporting Kansas City).

timelineItems.name: timothy dee micheli
timelineItems.text: Can't argue the fact that Liga MX is still much stronger than #MLS. But level of capitulation in #CCL away matches is hard to comprehend.

timelineItems.name: Ives Galarcep
timelineItems.text: GOAL Cruz Azul, makes it 4-1 now, 4-2 on agg. And see you next tournament MLS. Sporting KC is toast.

timelineItems.name: Tom Marshall
timelineItems.text: Chaco with number 5 for Cruz Azul. Could get very ugly this now for Sporting KC.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Golazo (70') | Cristian Giménez anota el quinto tras una pared a punta de cabezas con Formica. #CAZvSKC 5-1 (Global: 5-2)

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Cruz Azul. Sergio Nápoles tries a through ball, but Marco Fabián is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Doug Vergeer
timelineItems.text: Seriously. MLS needs these games midseason. 0-3 this week... #Disheartening #CAZvSKC

timelineItems.comment: Benny Feilhaber (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Christian Giménez (Cruz Azul).

timelineItems.name: Dan C. Schmidt
timelineItems.text: Champions League and MLS has to figure this out. Season for Mexico and US don't match, so players aren't fit or ready for this level. #SKC

timelineItems.name: Ives Galarcep
timelineItems.text: Something tells me Cruz Azul's manager isn't over getting humbled as Mexico coach in Columbus last year. #JustKidding #WeStillHaveDosACero

timelineItems.name: Nancy Cooper
timelineItems.text: I'm having flashbacks of Man U vs Sounders watching this game. #CAZvSKC

timelineItems.comment: C.J. Sapong (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Mauro Formica (Cruz Azul).

timelineItems.name: Jared Coffman
timelineItems.text: To be fair 5 games in 15 days is grueling. Add in injuries and suspensions, players were going to get gassed. Not enough bodies. #SKC

timelineItems.name: Jerrod Carpenter
timelineItems.text: Peterson has been a ghost this game. #SKC
